org.zaproxy.zap.authentication

Class ManualAuthenticationMethodType.ManualAuthenticationMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.AuthenticationMethod
      • org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.ManualAuthenticationMethodType.ManualAuthenticationMethod
  • Enclosing class:
    ManualAuthenticationMethodType

    public static class ManualAuthenticationMethodType.ManualAuthenticationMethod
extends AuthenticationMethod
    The implementation for an AuthenticationMethod where the user manually authenticates and then just selects an already authenticated WebSession.
